page.title: 14Health, New Galloway
page.content: There is one doctor for New Galloway and surrounding area. He has a surgery in New Galloway and at Dalry, which open at alternative times.The doctor has the back up of a Rural nurse. It is, also, her duty to supervise the growth of the pre_school child.A social welfare person visits homes to help with problems.Meals on Wheels can be provided for Senior Citizens.If hospital treatment is required, an ambulance is available if necessary. The nearest hospital is at Castle Douglas but for serious ailments,one goes to Dumfries Royal Infirmary.The villagers go to Castle Douglas/Newton Stewart for Dental care.There is a school nursewho visits regularly, as does the Doctor, speech therapist and Audiometrician.In general, the villagers do look after one another in a very caring way.Nobody suffers alone
